g.text: PROMOCODE ran out of usage| Promocode expired
Stock confirmation, list out state of stock
400 Bad Request { ERROR_CODE: OUT_OF_STOCK, payload: { <product_id_02>: OUT_OF_STOCK } }
create { status=(payment_type is COD ? PROCESSING : NEW), payment_provider_checkout_id, checkout_id, product_items, shipment_fees, taxes, payment_type: checkout.payment_method }
[reload to get payment information util payment status is PROCESSING and payment_provider_checkout_id existing (if not COD)]
redirect to payment_provider : Payment Provider: Checkout { payment_provider_checkout_id }
